About Pythias


At Pythias, we use cognitive computing methods like natural language processing, machine learning, and sentiment analysis - to build meaningful customer experiences and business solutions.
In Greek legend, Pythias was an embodiment of the Pythagorean ideal of true friendship. We aim to make software solutions that you can interact with just as you would with a friend. Also, our software stack is powered by Python.

Sentiment Analysis

Visualize human conversation on mobile, web, and social media. Get insights into what people are saying about your product / service in one glance - without having to sift through hundreds of comments and messages.

Natural Language Processing

Access digital services using natural language. Make your requests the way you talk - without having to remember keywords, or navigating menus.

Data Viz

Visualize different kinds of data from different sources: mobile, web, blogs, social media.

Pythias Labs

A showcase of the underlying Pythias technology.

Pythias-ImageMind: analyses your photos and tells you something about them.

Pythias-QuickSearch: allows you to make web queries when offline.
